wikipedia_page.main: Albert Thomas Fletcher (4 June 1867 – 1940) was an English international footballer, who played as a right half.

response: Cannon was a reliable wing–half, who deputised for both Albert Fletcher and Arthur Lowder during his two seasons with Wolverhampton Wanderers.
* Albert Fletcher (footballer, born 1867), English footballer for England and Wolverhampton Wanderers
* Albert Fletcher (footballer, born 1898), English footballer for Brentford and West Ham
